name: Daydream (itch) (BenButtles)
description:
Daydream

You're bored out of your mind, stuck in the fluorescent hell of "work". Your mind starts to wander, and you notice a strange object that seems out of place...

There is one hidden object in the office environment, and there is another inside of the second environment. Get creative, and keep looking outside (or is it inside?) the box!...

Press [space] to zoom (only in office)

Interact with objects: [E]

Move: WASD, mouse to look
